description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人。曾任全国人大常委会副委员长、国务委员、中华全国妇女联合会主席、中国红十字会会长等职。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level deputy leader. She has served as Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, State Councilor, President of the All-China Women's Federation, and President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前高级领导人，彭珮云的丈夫。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the husband of Peng Peiyun.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省的一个县级行政区，是彭珮云的出生地。
description.en: A county-level administrative division in Hunan Province, China, the birthplace of Peng Peiyun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的顶尖高等学府。
description.en: A top institution of higher learning located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间设于昆明的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university established in Kunming during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 1888年在美国美以美会等基督新教差会支持下于南京成立的大学，1952年主体并入南京大学。
description.en: A university founded in Nanjing in 1888 with the support of Protestant missions such as the American Methodist Episcopal Mission; its main body was merged into Nanjing University in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的顶尖高等学府。
description.en: A top institution of higher learning located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的一所著名大学。
description.en: A renowned university located in Hefei, Anhui Province, China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家人口和计划生育委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家人口和计划生育委员会
中华人民共和国国家计划生育委员会
en: National Population and Family Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国务院下属的负责计划生育工作的机构。
description.en: The former agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for family planning.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员之一，是国家级副职领导人。
description.en: One of the members of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a national-level deputy leader.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下的中国各族各界妇女的全国性群众组织。
description.en: A national mass organization for women of all ethnic groups and from all walks of life in China, under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国统一的红十字组织，是从事人道主义工作的社会救助团体。
description.en: The unified Red Cross organization of the People's Republic of China, a social relief group engaged in humanitarian work.

nodes.id: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China.

en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机关。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第九届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第九届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第九届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The ninth session of the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个岛屿，现由中华民国管辖。
description.en: An island in East Asia, currently administered by the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙的一个特别高级法院。
description.en: A special high court in Spain.

description.zh-cn: 青藏高原上的一块历史区域，现为中华人民共和国的西藏自治区。
description.en: A historical region on the Tibetan Plateau, now the Tibet Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，彭珮云的前任中国红十字会会长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, Peng Peiyun's predecessor as President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，彭珮云的继任中国红十字会会长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, Peng Peiyun's successor as President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，彭珮云的前任中华全国妇女联合会主席。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, Peng Peiyun's predecessor as President of the All-China Women's Federation.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，彭珮云的继任中华全国妇女联合会主席。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, Peng Peiyun's successor as President of the All-China Women's Federation.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，彭珮云的前任国家计划生育委员会主任。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, Peng Peiyun's predecessor as Minister of the State Family Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，彭珮云的继任国家计划生育委员会主任。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, Peng Peiyun's successor as Minister of the State Family Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 彭珮云是王汉斌的夫人。
description.en: Peng Peiyun is the wife of Wang Hanbin.

description.zh-cn: 彭珮云出生于湖南浏阳。
description.en: Peng Peiyun was born in Liuyang, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 彭珮云于1946年5月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Peng Peiyun joined the Communist Party of China in May 1946.

degree.en: Studied in the Foreign Languages Department

description.zh-cn: 在“文化大革命”中，彭珮云受到迫害，后下放劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Peng Peiyun was persecuted and sent to do manual labor.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

position.zh-cn: 副部长、国家教委副主任
position.en: Vice Minister, Vice Minister of the State Education Commission

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1985年任教育部副部长，1985年至1987年任国家教委副主任。
description.en: Served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Education from 1982 to 1985, and Vice Minister of the State Education Commission from 1985 to 1987.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家人口和计划生育委员会

relationships.source: 第九届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在第九届全国人大第一次会议上，她当选全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长。
description.en: At the first session of the 9th National People's Congress, she was elected Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 以中国红十字会会长的身份，率团访问台湾。
description.en: Led a delegation to visit Taiwan as the President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙国家法院对彭珮云发出逮捕令，指控其涉嫌在中国对西藏进行种族灭绝罪行。
description.en: The Spanish National Court issued an arrest warrant for Peng Peiyun, accusing her of alleged crimes of genocide against Tibet in China.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：彭珮云接替钱正英担任中国红十字会会长。
description.en: Succession of office: Peng Peiyun succeeded Qian Zhengying as President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：华建敏接替彭珮云担任中国红十字会会长。
description.en: Succession of office: Hua Jianmin succeeded Peng Peiyun as President of the Red Cross Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：彭珮云接替陈慕华担任中华全国妇女联合会主席。
description.en: Succession of office: Peng Peiyun succeeded Chen Muhua as President of the All-China Women's Federation.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：顾秀莲接替彭珮云担任中华全国妇女联合会主席。
description.en: Succession of office: Gu Xiulian succeeded Peng Peiyun as President of the All-China Women's Federation.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：彭珮云接替王伟担任中华人民共和国国家计划生育委员会主任。
description.en: Succession of office: Peng Peiyun succeeded Wang Wei as Minister of the State Family Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：张维庆接替彭珮云担任中华人民共和国国家计划生育委员会主任。
description.en: Succession of office: Zhang Weiqing succeeded Peng Peiyun as Minister of the State Family Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China.
